devdoc.details: Allows to create and configure a subdomain for Ethereum ENS in one call. After deploying this contract, change the owner of the domain you want to use to this deployed contract address. For example, transfer the ownership of "startonchain.eth" so anyone can create subdomains like "radek.startonchain.eth".

domainOwner(string,string).details: Returns the owner of a domain (e.g. "startonchain.eth"),

lockDomainOwnershipTransfers().details: The contract owner can lock and prevent any future domain ownership transfers.

newSubdomain(string,string,string,addres.details: Allows to create a subdomain (e.g. "radek.startonchain.eth"), set its resolver and set its target address

params._owner: - address that will become owner of this new subdomain
params._target: - address that this new domain will resolve to

subdomainOwner(string,string,string).details: Return the owner of a subdomain (e.g. "radek.startonchain.eth"),

subdomainTarget(string,string,string).details: Return the target address where the subdomain is pointing to (e.g. "0x12345..."),

transferContractOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a new owner.

params._owner: The address to transfer ownership to.

transferDomainOwnership(bytes32,address).details: The contract owner can take away the ownership of any domain owned by this contract.

updateRegistry(address).details: Allows to update to new ENS registry.

params._registry: The address of new ENS registry to use.

updateResolver(address).details: Allows to update to new ENS resolver.

params._resolver: The address of new ENS resolver to use.

devdoc.title: EnsSubdomainFactory
